summary: This document is a JPMorgan Chase Bank account statement for Jeffrey Epstein covering September 2002, showing two large wire transfers totaling $6,000,000. One transfer of $1,000,000 was sent to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co. for Jeffrey Epstein, and another transfer of $5,000,000 was sent to the same bank for Ghislaine Maxwell. The document is marked as confidential and requested by JPMorgan.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The primary account holder for the JPMorgan Chase Bank statement, from which large wire transfers were initiated.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Recipient of a $5,000,000 wire transfer from Jeffrey Epstein's JPMorgan account to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co.

connections.description: Epstein initiated a $5,000,000 wire transfer from his JPMorgan account to Maxwell via Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co.

events.title: $1,000,000 wire transfer to Epstein
events.description: A $1,000,000 wire transfer was sent from Jeffrey Epstein's JPMorgan account to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co. for Jeffrey Epstein, noted as 'LETTER FROM CLIENT'.

events.title: $5,000,000 wire transfer to Maxwell
events.description: A $5,000,000 wire transfer was sent from Jeffrey Epstein's JPMorgan account to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co. for Ghislaine Maxwell, noted as 'LETTER FROM CLIENT'.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, New York, NY 10154-1002 (JPMorgan Chase Bank address)
Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co.
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's JPMorgan account statement shows a $1,000,000 wire transfer to himself via Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co. on September 16, 2002.
The same account shows a $5,000,000 wire transfer to Ghislaine Maxwell via Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co. on September 18, 2002.
Both transfers were initiated by 'LETTER FROM CLIENT', indicating written authorization from Epstein.
The document is marked 'Confidential Treatment Requested by JPMorgan' and is part of legal discovery (JPM-SDNY-00005512).
The transactions occurred within a two-day period, totaling $6,000,000 in outgoing wire transfers from Epstein's account.
